A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The LOST jedi.
This movie looked like the bad ending of a series.
The main characters and villains DIE in the most forced and stupid way\, questions on previous installments are NOT resolved\, it adds NOTHING new and uses gimmicks that contradict everything that was established (can't even qualify as plot twists)

Rogue ONE should be part of the official saga and this should be labeled as FAN FICTION.
